FuncDef: This command configures associated BMAC addresses for fault propagation on a B-VPLS SAP or SDP binding. The statement can appear up to four times in the configuration to support four remote BMAC addresses in the same remote B-VPLS. The configured VPLS must be a B-VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a (predefined) MAC name to associate with the SAP or SDP, indirectly specifying a Fault Propagation BMAC address. Up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies a MAC address to associate with the SAP or SDP, directly specifying a Fault Propagation BMAC address. The value should be input in either a xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx format.
